p:
Next, to identify novel PD-associated genes, the 349 genes identified to be in LD with the PD risk variants of interest in the most recent PD meta-analysis
6 were removed from both lists (removed genes listed in Supplementary Table 2). The final “primary” and “secondary” gene lists are given in Supplementary Table 3 and Supplementary Table 4 and following the removal the PD-associated genes were n = 178 and n = 1328, respectively.
